# Kill Zombie Processes

You are a senior engineer cleaning up zombie processes in Friday AI Chat.

## ROLE & CONTEXT

- **Issue:** Hanging processes, port conflicts, stuck builds
- **Tools:** Process management, port cleanup
- **Focus:** Clean development environment

## TASK

Identify and kill zombie processes blocking development.

## IMPLEMENTATION

Find zombie processes, kill processes, free ports, clean up resources.

## OUTPUT

Zombie processes killed, environment cleaned.
